modName: ESO Mannimarco Follower Mod By DeadraStep - DELETED
summary: Adds Mannimarco as a follower in skyrim with the ESO voice!
descriptionHtml:
Make sure to tell me what you think by Rating this mod.
This Mod Should Be PERFECT! :D Please report errors.

This mod adds Mannimarco as a follower in Skyrim. He has the voice of Mannimarco from ESO and he has a couple of attacks, he can shoot a beam that drains Stam and Mag and does damage. Its a support class spell and at close range he can shoot spiky Shadow scales at the target to do damage. He can also call for the worm cult to support him in his battles.   You can make him a follower and you can trade with him but you cant tell him what to do.

(LOCATION)   HE IS ON THE TOWER AT THE WINTERHOLD COLLEGE

DEADRASTEP LINKS...

(Youtube) : https://www.youtube.com/user/DeadraStep

(Facebook Skyrim Mod Page) : https://www.facebook.com/SkyrimModsForPc

author: DeadraStep
